products.title: 4P F20C S2000 BARE RACE CASTING
products.body_html:
IN STOCK SHIPS NOW

Now you can purchase our Race Castings bare and ready for you to machine yourself.  We have been asked by engine builders worldwide for us to supply them with our superior Race Castings so that they could further develop their own engine programs.  Now you can purchase them here and receive bulk discounts right on our website.  The cylinder heads come as shown in the photos with all mating faces machined, seat bores and spring seat pads machined, guide bores machined, but the ports and chambers are left alone so that you can port them to your application.  Spark plug tubes are included when you purchase.  All oiling holes and coolant passages are machined for you as well.

Casting Design Features

As OEM castings have gone out of production, those in the field have aged and worn, and the demands on our race engines have increased, we needed to develop a superior alternative to OEM.  The 4P Race Casting is superior in every way. Exclusively available at 4P.

  • Made IN THE USA from A356-T6 Aluminum
  • These "porting castings" give us a clean slate to put any port size and shape we choose, and offer a "full cleanup"
  • We machine a wide variety of combustion chamber shapes and sizes to suit your application.
  • Port wall thickness is increased over OEM dramatically to allow us to run larger ports and move them around for high rpm applications.  Increased port wall thickness also allows for extreme boost applications.
  • Extra thick deck for increased rigidity and high boost handling capabilities.
  • Superior cooling through 3D printed water jackets
  • All heads accept VTEC and non-VTEC arrangement with OEM or aftermarket components.

products.title: 4P K20C1 Ported High Flow Oil Pump
products.body_html:
IN STOCK

The 4P Ported High Flow Oil Pump for your K20C1 Type R, Accord, or Integra has been carefully developed after years of on-track development in 4P K20C1 racing engines.  Engines for racing applications are built with different tolerances and operated at high temperature under full load.  RPM capabilities are increased dramatically in 4P race engines and the need for a better performing oil system is critical.  These changes in the operating environment and how the engines are assembled require the oil pump to flow much better than OEM to maintain the pressures required to protect your engine.

The 4P oil pump increases the flow rate by more than 10% and eliminates cavitation and aeration in your oil as you begin to increase your engine speed beyond 8000 rpm.

These pumps are great for your track day car, dedicated street car, and are perfectly suitable for your everyday street car.  This part is cheap insurance to protect your multi-thousand dollar investment.  You can depend on the 4P name and our relentless pursuit to produce the world's best engines.  We bring decades of experience in perfecting Honda oiling systems as seen with our world renowned K20 and B-Series oil systems that have allowed racers to maintain oil pressure to beyond 12,000 rpm without cavitation and while maintaining constant pressure through the entire RPM range.  That same expertise has been applied to our K20C1 Ported High Flow pump in our racing engines since their release and is now available to everyone.

Application:
-K20C Type R
-K20C Accord
-K20C Integra
-Upgrade for Honda TC and TCR

products.title: 4P 2.5L USAC Midget Race Engine LONG BLOCK ONLY
products.body_html:
This is complete replacement long block WITHOUT accessories for our 2.5L USAC Midget Race Engine.  Engine is valve cover to oil pan, with port covers and plugs for easy transport and storage.

We ship worldwide.  Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote or for other inquiries

products.title: 4P Saenz 300M Midget K24 Connecting Rod
products.body_html:
The 4P Saenz 300M Midget Connecting Rod was designed after seeing years of engine abuse from national level race cars.  We examined several different styles of connecting rods and analyzed bearing wear in engines that came in for service, and engines that failed.  If you are running a series under 9000 rpm, then you can run a standard 4340 Saenz Performance Series I-Beam connecting rod.  If you are running at a national level and plan to see 9600 and beating up the limiters, we highly recommend you spend the extra money on this rod for longevity.  These can go through multiple engine service intervals.

300M Material
ARP 625+ Rod Bolt

products.title: 4P Lightweight Premium Honda Midget Race Header
products.body_html:
The 4P Lightweight Premium Honda Midget Race Header is a thin wall stainless steel header for those of you that really appreciate a high quality premium race header.

These are made to order. Please allow 6-8 weeks for delivery.

products.title: Schoenfeld Headers Honda K24 Midget Header
products.body_html: Schoenfeld Headers Honda K24 Midget Header

products.title: Kinsler Mechanical Injection (Honda K-Series)
products.body_html: This Kinsler Mechanical Injector is setup for our National USAC midget engine.  Adjustments can be made when ordered if you have special provisions that need to be made for a different size engine or lower power level.

products.title: 4P USAC Midget CNC Cylinder Head
products.body_html:
The 4P USAC Midget CNC Cylinder Head was specifically designed for midget racing after years of development.  The whole idea behind this head was sizing it properly to make sure we had plenty of low end punch for restarts given our 154 cubic inch crutch, yet enough balls up top to pull hard to our USAC mandated 9400 rpm limit.  These engines come on hard and don't give up.

Includes

  • CNC Ported intake and exhaust ports
  • Oversize Intake Valve Seats
  • Bronze Valve Guides
  • Precision CNC valve job using the latest NEWEN Fixed Turning technology
  • Resurface
  • OEM vents are machined into oil drain backs for leaned operation
  • Cylinder 4 end of cylinder head is machined down for firewall clearance
  • PPA/PPL Honda Cylinder Head core is INCLUDED.  You can send your PPA in for a $200 credit.

Features & Benefits

  • 370 cfm airflow
  • Port designed specifically for midget racing and methanol
  • Slow-cut precision 5-axis cnc porting, second to none on machining quality.
  • 45 degree valve job designed for long life and durability.
  • Unique power producing exhaust port design.
  • Our heads are all shipped with installation tips, a sheet of desired clearances for setting up your engine, and a flow chart from your head.

products.title: 4P Midget Dry Sump and Accessory System
products.body_html:
When building a Honda Midget one of the biggest challenges is putting together all the bits and pieces with proper mounting and bracketry.  4 Piston has taken the guess work out of this for you and has put together a complete "bolt-on" dry sump system that you can easily install with no headaches.  The pump mounts directly to a fixed billet water plate with no tinkering around with pump location adjustments.  It simply bolts on, is rigidly mounted for a strenuous racing environment, and is easy to setup.  This kit also includes a high flow Meziere water pump, KSE power steering pump, and provisions to mount your fuel pump. 

What is Included:
1.  Aviaid 3 scavenge oil pump
2.  Water plate with oil pump mounting provisions
3.  ATI balancer with drive gears and belt
4.  Meziere water pump with all mounting hardware to drive from oil pump
5.  KSE Power Steering Pump and drive
6.  Aluminum Oil Pan
7.  Brown and Miller oil lines from pump to pan
8.  Installation Photos and Instructions
**No oil tank is included.  Choose an oil tank that fits your chassis arrangement**

products.title: 4P Honda Midget Fuel System
products.body_html:
Complete Fuel System to power your Honda Midget to be use with your Kinsler or Engler mechanical injection manifold.

Included in the box

  • Kinsler Tough Pump TP030061
  • Kinsler 3-way shut off valve
  • Monster Mesh 100 micron stainless steel fuel filter 8354-100 
  • Monster Mesh 100 micron stainless steel fuel filter 8350-100 
  • Quick disconnect main bypass valve 3112 
  • Secondary bypass valve 3156
  • High speed bypass 3982
  • Kinsler Torque Valve Assembly 3210 (stumble valve)
  • Jet Case Holder and MATCHED JETS. .050 THRU .090 EVERY .002

products.title: 4 Piston Racing USAC Midget CAMSHAFTS v2 (K-Series)
products.body_html:
This camshaft was specifically designed for our USAC midget engine program, and is now available for purchase outside of our engines.  This is a larger more aggressive camshaft than our v1.  It provides plenty of low end punch to pull the car off the corners, but will allow you to run your engine up to 9600 RPM down the stretch.  It is designed for smooth valve operation that is easy on the cam chain, guides, and tensioner.  Pair this with our 4P Midget Cylinder Head and 4P Adjustable Cam Gears for a complete package that can produce 400hp at 154 cubic inches.  Camshaft can also be used in 145 cubic inch engines, with great results.

Intake Lift - 0.600"
Intake Duration - 266 @ 0.050"
Exhaust Lift - 0.550"
Exhaust Duration - 266 @ 0.050"

Recommended Valve Spring:
4 Piston PSI Pro Stock - Heavy Duty single spring.  This is in our midget engine.
Ferrea S10100 - Standard Road Race/Drag Race
Supertech H1021D - Standard Road Race/Drag Race
Other springs kits and brands may be suitable. This is our best recommendation.

Recommended Rocker Arm:
Ferrea single roller rocker or 4P RR8000 must be used to meet non-VTEC USAC rules.  It is not recommended to lock VTEC function on an OEM 3-lobe rocker.

4 Piston camshafts are Made in the USA from tool steel billet cores, by experts with over 50 years of camshaft design expertise. These cams are not only designed to make good power, but they are designed to promote long timing chain and tensioner life and proper valvetrain harmonics using the latest in camshaft design software.

products.title: 4P 2.5L USAC Midget Race Engine
products.body_html:
Description

The 4 Piston Racing USAC Midget Race Engine was specifically developed for National Level competition. The goal with this project is to open a door for competitors that are trying to get into national level competition, but the cost of entry for current top powerplants is just too far out of reach. It is also an opportunity for existing high budget teams to take a big chunk of their expenses on power out and redistribute that to other parts of their race program.  This is a pure race engine with some of the best components and it does make the power to run with and outrun some of the best offerings.  We believe we have put together a package that with equal car preparation will out accelerate any other offering.

This engine package is TURN KEY with ignition system, dry sump oil system, water pump, power steering pump, Injection and Fuel System, header, and Dyno Tested before shipment for $39,915.  Engine service costs are $6500 and can extend up to $9500 depending on what needs to be refreshed.  As we have learned, running up front at national events these engines are run much harder than local small series racers will run them.
 

  • Fully dressed engine weighs 230 lbs.
  • Valve Cover to Oil Pan, Complete Engine, Turn Key
  • R1i Ignition System with logging and lambda is standard
  • Motec Ignition System is optional at no extra cost (Constant Flow or EFI)
  • 154 Cubic Inches per USAC rules.  We do build these in other sizes smaller and larger for other countries and series regulations.
  • Electronic Fuel Injection is available if your series allows it.  Our engine mapping is exceptional.
  • Meticulously machined, assembled and dyno tested in Danville, Indiana
  • Ask the guys that run OUR Honda engine what they think...they love the power.

These are typically IN STOCK, but please contact us to check.

We ship worldwide.  Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote or for other inquiries

products.title: 4 Piston Racing USAC Midget CAMSHAFTS v1 (K-Series)
products.body_html:
This camshaft was specifically designed for our USAC midget engine program, and is now available for purchase outside of our engines.  This is NOT a big drag race cam.  It provides plenty of low end punch to pull the car off the corners, but will allow you to run your engine up to 9600 RPM down the stretch.  It is designed for smooth valve operation that is easy on the cam chain, guides, and tensioner.  Pair this with our 4P Midget Cylinder Head and 4P Adjustable Cam Gears for a complete package that can produce 380+hp at 153 cubic inches.  Camshaft can also be used in 145 cubic inch engines, with great results.

Intake Lift - 0.533"
Intake Duration - 260 @ 0.050"
Exhaust Lift - 0.513"
Exhaust Duration - 260 @ 0.050"

Recommended Valve Spring:
4 Piston PSI Pro Stock - Heavy Duty single spring.  This is in our midget engine.
Ferrea S10100 - Standard Road Race/Drag Race
Supertech H1021D - Standard Road Race/Drag Race
Other springs kits and brands may be suitable. This is our best recommendation.

Recommended Rocker Arm:
Ferrea single roller rocker must be used to meet non-VTEC USAC rules.  It is not recommended to lock VTEC function on an OEM 3-lobe rocker.

4 Piston camshafts are Made in the USA from tool steel billet cores, by experts with over 50 years of camshaft design expertise. These cams are not only designed to make good power, but they are designed to promote long timing chain and tensioner life and proper valvetrain harmonics using the latest in camshaft design software.

products.title: 4P K-Series BARE RACE CASTING
products.body_html:
IN STOCK SHIPS NOW

Now you can purchase our Race Castings bare and ready for you to machine yourself.  We have been asked by engine builders worldwide for us to supply them with our superior Race Castings so that they could further develop their own engine programs.  Now you can purchase them here and receive bulk discounts right on our website.  The cylinder heads come as shown in the photos with all mating faces machined, seat bores and spring seat pads machined, guide bores machined, but the ports and chambers are left alone so that you can port them to your application.  Spark plug tubes are included when you purchase.  All oiling holes and coolant passages are machined for you as well.

Casting Design Features

As OEM castings have gone out of production, those in the field have aged and worn, and the demands on our race engines have increased, we needed to develop a superior alternative to OEM.  The 4P Race Casting is superior in every way. Exclusively available at 4P.

  • Made IN THE USA from A356-T6 Aluminum
  • These "porting castings" give us a clean slate to put any port size and shape we choose, and offer a "full cleanup"
  • We machine a wide variety of combustion chamber shapes and sizes to suit your application.
  • Port wall thickness is increased over OEM dramatically to allow us to run larger ports and move them around for high rpm applications.  Increased port wall thickness also allows for extreme boost applications.
  • Extra thick deck for increased rigidity and high boost handling capabilities.
  • Superior cooling through 3D printed water jackets
  • All heads accept VTEC and non-VTEC arrangement with OEM or aftermarket components.

products.title: 4P Kingpin Turbo K-Series Race Head
products.body_html:
Introducing the 4P "Kingpin" K-Series Race Head

    This cylinder head is specifically designed to take the extreme abuse of ultra-high horsepower applications.  As SFWD, AWD, and Pro RWD cars begin to exceed 1500whp, 1800hp, and even 2000+hp, the OEM head castings become a failure point, often splitting in half or cracking through the deck and port walls.  The 4P Kingpin uses the 4P Race Casting which features a deck that is 3x thicker than any OEM casting, and port walls that are MUCH thicker than stock.  These heads have been proven on race cars running over 100psi of boost that were splitting heads in half nearly every pass.  These simply will not suffer the same fate.  That thicker deck and casting provides superior head gasket sealing and improves power by keeping things rigid and from moving around.  These castings are made in the USA using premium materials, then we put them through a special process that removes porosity to make these solid like a piece of billet.  While your competition is running stock ports to try to hold them together, step up to the 4P Kingpin and give your race program a serious power and reliability advantage.

    As seen on the Worlds Fastest 4 Cylinder "No War" 5.86@244 MPH!

    Casting Design Features

    As OEM castings have gone out of production, those in the field have aged and worn, and the demands on our race engines have increased, we needed to develop a superior alternative to OEM.  The 4P Race Casting is superior in every way. Exclusively available at 4P.

    • Made IN THE USA from A356-T6 Aluminum
    • These "porting castings" give us a clean slate to put any port size and shape we choose, and offer a "full cleanup"
    • We machine a wide variety of combustion chamber shapes and sizes to suit your application.
    • Port wall thickness is increased over OEM dramatically to allow us to run larger ports and move them around for high rpm applications.  Increased port wall thickness also allows for extreme boost applications.
    • Extra thick deck for increased rigidity and high boost handling capabilities.
    • Superior cooling through 3D printed water jackets
    • All heads accept VTEC and non-VTEC arrangement with OEM or aftermarket components.
    • These race ported heads are 100% designed, machined, and finished in house at 4 Piston Racing.  We will build you the head you need for your race or street program.
    • Heads available in PRB and RSP/RBC Style water jacket arrangements.
      • R40 K24Z heads available in 4 Port Exhaust Configurations to fit ANY of our Port Designs.
      • Also available for F20C/F22C S2000....ask us for a quote!  It is the same price!

products.title: 4P B-Series Engine TURBO T-Shirt
products.body_html:
High quality T-Shirt with 4 Piston logo across front, and a 4P B-Series TURBO Race Engine on back.  B-Series Represent!

IN STOCK SHIPS NOW

products.title: 4P R403 K24Z R40 Billet Stage 3 Camshafts
products.body_html:
IN STOCK - Shipping Now!!

Introducing the 4P R40 Billet Stage 3 camshaft.  This camshaft is designed to be a a performance upgrade over our drop-in camshaft.  It can be used in a stock engine, but will require a valve spring upgrade to handle the lift and RPM.  All stock rocker assemblies and control systems are used.  

This is a very easy to install cam that allows you maximize horsepower in your K24Z R40 based engine and can produce 25-50whp gains depending on the engine combination and your tuner's ability.  On turbocharged applications, expect 75+whp gains at the same boost level.  The more the engine needs the airflow, the more the camshafts work.  You can also expect the powerband to be extended another 1500rpm.

This single port R40 cylinder head arrangement and the K24Z7 engine is one that the aftermarket has avoided for various reasons.  The reality is that it is used in many motorsports applications that demanded solutions for more power, and it has some serious benefits.  We set out to prove the viability of this engine and its ability to produce power WITH the single port exhaust arrangement.

They will produce more with our Pro R40 CNC Cylinder Head which outflows any stock 4 port conventional K20 head.


Dyno Tests shown are a built block with 12.8:1 compression, 4P Pro R40 CNC Cylinder Head, 4P R40 Camshafts and 93 octane PUMP GAS. 

328hp for the R402 DROP IN cam
344hp for the R403 Stage 3 cam
The engine used in testing was configured so that we could back to back the Pro R40, our R40 Race Casting, and a conventional 4 port, and various camshafts.  We have put a lot of development into this engine, and can offer you an engine package that suits your specific racing needs, or simply give you the parts for big performance gains for your 9th gen.

products.title: 4P R402 K24Z R40 Billet Drop-In Camshafts
products.body_html:
IN STOCK - Shipping Now!!!

Introducing the 4P R40 Billet Drop-in camshaft.  This camshaft is designed to be a straight DROP IN camshaft installation into a stock K24Z engine, even with the stock valve spring.  All stock rocker assemblies and control systems are used.  

This is a very easy to install cam that allows you maximize horsepower in your K24Z R40 based engine and can produce 15-30whp gains depending on the engine combination and your tuner's ability.  On turbocharged applications, expect well over 50whp gains at the same boost level.  The more the engine needs the airflow, the more the camshafts work.  You can also expect the powerband to be extended another 1000-1500rpm.

This single port R40 cylinder head arrangement and the K24Z7 engine is one that the aftermarket has avoided for various reasons.  The reality is that it is used in many motorsports applications that demanded solutions for more power, and it has some serious benefits.  We set out to prove the viability of this engine and its ability to produce power WITH the single port exhaust arrangement.

They will produce more with our Pro R40 CNC Cylinder Head which outflows any stock 4 port conventional K20 head.


Dyno Tests shown are a built block with 12.8:1 compression, 4P Pro R40 CNC Cylinder Head, 4P R40 Camshafts and 93 octane PUMP GAS. 

328hp for the R402 DROP IN cam
344hp for the R403 Stage 3 cam
The engine used in testing was configured so that we could back to back the Pro R40, our R40 Race Casting, and a conventional 4 port, and various camshafts.  We have put a lot of development into this engine, and can offer you an engine package that suits your specific racing needs, or simply give you the parts for big performance gains for your 9th gen.

products.title: 4P K24 IN STOCK Short Block - Turbo & All Motor
products.body_html:
4 Piston Racing IN STOCK Short Block Assembly

IN STOCK SHIPS RIGHT AWAY - No Wait Time for Build

Built with a BRAND NEW OEM Honda Block and Crank, not refurbished.

Components

  • *NEW* OEM Sleeve Block - BRAND NEW OEM Honda K24 Block
  • *NEW* OEM Honda Crank - BRAND NEW OEM Forged Honda Crankshaft.
  • Callies Compstar - Callies H-Beam Connecting Rods. (Optional Saenz Performance I-Beam)
  • Wiseco Shelf Stock Pistons - Wiseco 87mm Pistons available in compression of your choice

Options

  • Upgrade Connecting rods
  • Ported Type S Oil Pump - The OEM Type S pump works great for motors that turn up to 9000 rpm. Past that, the pump can cavitate. We modify brand new OEM pumps for use up to 11,000 rpm. Skip the big cost and installation challenges of a modified S2000 pump in favor of this effective and more affordable option.

products.title: Ramey Racing Billet B-Series Timing Cover
products.body_html:
Made from billet 6061 right here in the USA. This cover utilizes the 3 OEM bolts off of the oil pump to ensure perfect alignment. The cover features a laser engraved timing mark in the OEM location or an optional adjustable pointer for the race guys really looking to dial their setup in. This works with the OEM crank pulley or any after market pulley including the ATI race and street damper.

Fits all OBD2 engines.  Uses OEM timing cover bolts.

products.title: 4P Nitromethane Piston and Rod COMBO - K24
products.body_html:
With growing interest in running the Honda K-Series on nitromethane and mixed fuels, we have developed a piston and rod package to specifically stand up to abuse that off the shelf setups are not designed to handle.  We have spent an extensive amount of time not only on the track, but on the engine dyno pushing these engines to the limit up to 100% nitromethane with high output ignition boxes, magneto ignition, and even basic OEM ignition. 

We worked with Wiseco piston engineers and top fuel engineers to strengthen these components for 4 digit nitro power.  The piston features an extra thick top, thick skirt that it pulled back for use with a big skirt, a DLC coated heavy duty tool steel wrist pins with buttons, and a heavy duty ring pack to keep your cylinders sealed up.

The MGP connecting rod is oversized for power levels exceeding 1500 and features an oversized aerospace rod bolt.

Don't wait 20 weeks for a custom setup when you can purchase our Nitro Specific package and have it shipped right away.

-88mm Pistons available for stock sleeve blocks
-90mm Pistons in stock for sleeved blocks
-Rods in stock for OEM 99mm Cranks and 106mm billet cranks

variants.title: 88mm (can use stock sleeve) / 106mm Billet Crank (GSR Journal)

products.body_html:
The 4P K20/K24 port covers not only look great, they allow you to safely store or transport your engine.  Keep debris from inside your engine and protect the flanges during transport or while you wait for your project to be completed.

INTAKE and EXHAUST covers included in purchase

Features

  • Safe storage and transportation
  • Protects port surfaces, valves, and seats
  • Keep the competition from seeing your race head
  • Precision machined from billet aluminum
  • Fits all 4 port K20/K24 based cylinder heads

INTAKE and EXHAUST covers included in purchase

Features

products.title: 4P TRKTR3 Valve Spring Kit K20C1 for TR3
products.body_html: This 4 Piston Valve Spring Kit is used with the 4P TR3 Billet Camshafts.  Other valve spring kits may coil bind with this camshaft, so make sure your engine builder checks.  If you are doing this at home, make sure you have THIS KIT.

products.title: 4P TR2 Drop-In Camshafts - K20C1 Type R
products.body_html:
IN STOCK

Fits FK8 and FL5 Civic Type R

The 4P TR2 drop-in camshaft was specifically designed for easy installation into a stock 2.0L K20C1, on a stock valve spring.  These can be easily installed in about 2 hours by an experienced technician....it may take you a touch longer if you are feeling your way through it. The primary lobes allow for a stock idle and tame drivability perfectly suitable for everyday use in traffic, but with significant power gains over stock.  You will experience a much more audible and traditional VTEC crossover that was lost in the OEM K20C1 and much more RPM capability over an OEM camshaft.  These are made from a billet core camshaft to ensure maximum durability.

Gains of 25-40+hp are realized through the RPM range, and more as you continue to pull to 8000 rpm.   Camshafts are supplied with cam card and VTC limiting pins with detailed photo for their placement.

Stock valve springs are OK with this cam.  It is a true DROP IN.

Recommended Valve Spring:
Stock is acceptable
Supertech is acceptable
Ferrea KT4033 and KT4038 are acceptable

Recommended Rocker Arm:
OEM Honda Rocker Arm

FK8 Test Data
K20C1 Camshaft Testing - Unlocking the RPM, sound, and power we all lo – 4 Piston Racing

FL5 Test Data
FL5 Civic Type R - 4P TR2 Camshaft Install and Dyno Test – 4 Piston Racing

products.title: 4P TR3 Racing Camshafts - K20C1 Type R
products.body_html:
IN STOCK!!

Fits FK8 and FL5 Civic Type R

The 4P TR3 racing camshaft was specifically designed for our 2.0L K20C1 race engine program. The primary lobes allow for a stock idle and tame drivability perfectly suitable for everyday use in traffic, but with significant power gains over stock.  You will experience a much more audible and traditional VTEC crossover that was lost in the OEM K20C1 and much more RPM capability over an OEM camshaft.  These are made from a billet core camshaft to ensure maximum durability

Gains of 40-60+hp are realized through the RPM range, and more as you continue to pull beyond 8000 rpm.   Camshafts are supplied with cam card and VTC limiting pins with detailed photo for their placement.

Intake Lift - 0.491"
Intake Duration - 234 @ 0.050"
Exhaust Lift - 0.494"
Exhaust Duration - 238 @ 0.050"

**Aftermarket Valve Springs are Required for the TR3 Camshaft.  They will coil bind a stock valve spring**

Required Valve Spring:

  • 4P Spring KIT TRKTR3
  • **Ferrea KT4033 with SL1153 spring seat on exhaust cam**
    Spring will Coil Bind if you do not use SL1153 spring seat on exhaust
  • Ferrea KT4038 can be used but it eliminates VTEC

Recommended Rocker Arm:
OEM Honda Rocker Arm

FK8 Test Data
K20C1 Camshaft Testing - Unlocking the RPM, sound, and power we all lo – 4 Piston Racing

FL5 Test Data

products.body_html:
4 Piston Racing Head Stud Kit for Honda K24Z (K24Z2, K24Z3, K24Z7)

These Heavy Duty Head Studs are made by ARP exclusively for 4 Piston.  Don't settle for overseas head studs that do not carry the ARP name and material quality.

products.title: Supertech Valve Spring Kit (K24Z R40)
products.body_html:
Supertech Dual Valve Spring Kit for Honda K24Z2, K24Z3, K24Z7 9th Generations Civic.
    • Type: Dual Spring

products.title: Ferrea Competition Plus Valves (K24Z R40)
products.body_html: This is Ferrea's top of the line valve for your Honda engine. This valve is suitable for all horsepower levels and especially engines that will experience extreme exhaust temperatures from forced induction.

products.title: Ferrea 6000 Series Competition Valves (K24Z R40)
products.body_html:
Ferrea Valves, the world’s leading manufacturer of racing valves, introduces the Sport Compact market into the already race-proven Ferrea 6000 Series Competition Valves. This Ferrea Valve Series is designed to provide excellent reliability in an environment of high RPM and high spring pressures, at a budget price.

These valves have higher fatigue resistance and tensile strengths than our competitor’s best offering. The 6000 Series Competition Valves are specially designed for street, drag and rally racing applications. To manufacture the valves we use our exclusive two-step slow-forging process applied to the special alloys selected to suit intake and exhaust applications. We provide a unique heat-treatment and stress-relieving process, along with hard chrome stems and friction-welded hard tips. We finish the valves with a swirl-polished head.

Ferrea Valves feature flow improvements to deliver the power needed for today’s sophisticated Sport Compact racing engines.
